i1.name: Transcendent
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Each of '''Syndra's''' [[Champion ability|abilities]] gain an additional effect at maximum rank.
i1.notes:
* The earliest possible champion level required for ''Transcendent'' to take effect is level 9, as this is the lowest level at which a basic ability can reach rank 5.
* '''Syndra's''' abilities gain additional visual effects when they reach rank 5. Her spells will also gain a colored tint - classic Syndra has red outlines while {{csl|Syndra|Justicar|Justicar}} gains an orange glow.
** {{ai|Dark Sphere|Syndra}} will cause fractures to appear in the earth when it is used.
** {{ai|Scatter the Weak|Syndra}} gains a wider cone.

q1.name: Dark Sphere
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After {{fd|0.6}} seconds, '''Syndra''' conjures a ''Dark Sphere'' at the target location, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all enemies hit, which then remains for 6 seconds.
q1.notes:
* ''Dark Sphere'' has no cast time and does not interrupt '''Syndra's''' previous orders.
* ''Dark Sphere'' can be conjured inside terrain, but can't be thrown there with {{ai|Force of Will|Syndra}}.

w1.name: Force of Will
description: {{sbc|First Active:}} '''Syndra''' telekinetically grabs the nearest {{ai|Dark Sphere|Syndra}}, enemy [[minion]] or non-epic [[monster]] within 400 range from the target location for 5 seconds, or if not found it grabs the nearest '''Dark Sphere'''. If a '''Dark Sphere''' is grabbed, its duration is refreshed. If a minion or monster is grabbed, it is put in {{tip|stasis}}.

{{sbc|Second Active:}} '''Syndra''' throws the grabbed target to the designated area, granting {{tip|sight}} of the projectile's surroundings as they fall. The projectile, if it is an enemy, and any enemies struck take {{as|magic damage}} and are {{tip|slow|slowed}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
{{sbc|{{ai|Transcendent|Syndra}} Bonus:}} ''Force of Will'' deals {{tip|true damage|{{as|20% '''bonus''' true damage}}}}.
w1.notes:
* ''Force of Will'' has no cast time and does not interrupt '''Syndra's''' previous orders.
* Thrown objects grant a brief instance of [[sight]] when they land.
* Syndra '''cannot''' grab any of the following units:
** {{ui|Baron Nashor}}
** {{ui|Dragon}}
** [[Champion]]s
** {{ai|Noxious Trap|Teemo|Traps}}
*** {{cai|Jack in the Box|Shaco}} is the exception.
** {{ci|Wukong|link=Wukong#Decoy|text=Champion clones}}
* Casting {{si|Teleport}} will cause Syndra to cancel ''Force of Will'' and drop anything she is holding.
* Grabbing prioritizes '''Dark Spheres'''.
* Even if the unit is put in ''stasis'' minion attacks may still kill it during it. The ''dead'' unit may still, however, be launched.
* Once upgraded to maximum rank '''Syndra''' gains a total damage increase of (20 + {{as|enemy's MR}}{{Divided by}}5)%.
* Enemy [[Champion summoned units|pets]] that passively have an effect on their surroundings will continue to affect the area around them while they are being held. For example, {{cai|Summon: Tibbers|Annie|Tibbers}} will continue to inflict burn damage on surrounding units while in stasis.
* Grabbing a {{ai|Dark Sphere|Syndra}} will cause the duration on it to refresh, but only on the first cast, not when it is thrown.
* ''Force of Will'' has additional effects when targeting the {{ui|Blue Sentinel}} and {{ui|Red Brambleback}}. Throwing the former will refund 10 [[mana]] to Syndra upon cast and will reduce the cooldown of ''Force of Will'' by 1 second, while throwing the latter will apply the {{bi|Crest of Cinders}} burn to any affected units in the area of effect.

e1.name: Scatter the Weak
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Syndra''' {{tip|airborne|knocks back}} all enemy units for 400 units and up to 800 units away from '''Syndra''', dealing {{as|magic damage}}.

{{ai|Dark Sphere|Syndra|Dark Spheres}} can also be knocked back for 1000 units and up to 1300 units away from '''Syndra''', knocking back all enemy units they collide with for 100 units and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, dealing ''Scatter the Weak's'' damage to enemies who weren't affected by the initial cast.
{{sbc|{{ai|Transcendent|Syndra}} Bonus:}} ''Scatter the Weak's'' area of effect is 50% wider.
e1.notes: * Launched {{ai|Dark Sphere|Syndra|Dark Spheres}} that successfully strike an enemy will grant [[sight]] on that enemy for the duration of the stun.

r1.name: Unleashed Power
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a short delay, '''Syndra''' grabs up to 4 {{tt|nearby|3000 range, approximated}} {{ai|Dark Sphere|Syndra|Dark Spheres}} and the three orbiting around her and hurls them at the target enemy [[champion]], dealing {{as|magic damage}} per sphere.
The {{ai|Dark Sphere|Syndra|Dark Spheres}} will then remain on the ground for 6 seconds.
{{sbc|{{ai|Transcendent|Syndra}} Bonus:}} ''Unleashed Power's'' cast range is increased.
r1.notes:
* ''Unleashed Power'' has a brief cast time before it activates, but '''Syndra''' does not have to remain in place while the spheres apply their damage. She can walk away as soon as the casting has completed, as the spheres only begin dealing their damage after the casting time.
* Each one of the sphere hits is considered a single-target spell, triggering {{ii|Muramana}} each time.
* Casting ''Unleashed Power'' on a target that becomes [[Untargetability|untargetable]] while the spheres are in flight will cause all spheres to deal no damage and be destroyed.
* Spheres already in flight will still travel if '''Syndra's''' target dies, but any remaining sphere will not. However their duration will still get reset.
* A ''Dark Sphere'' summoned very shortly before ''Unleashed Power'' '''will''' be used as one of the spheres that get thrown.
** Depending on how many spheres are on the map and how far away the enemy is upon casting ''Unleashed Power'' it is possible that '''Syndra''' would conjure the sphere behind her as if she was going to throw it, but she won't.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block the damage of a single sphere.
